// === BOSS GATE TRIGGER ===
// Objects: BossGate (Sprite, invisible box), Boss01, BossCore
// Variables: BossActive (global or local) = 0 initially
// Place BossGate where you want the fight to begin (e.g., corridor entrance).

On start of layout
→ BossGate: Set visible False
→ System: Set global variable BossActive to 0
→ Boss01: Set enabled False
→ BossCore: Set enabled False

// Trigger when either player crosses the gate
On collision Player with BossGate
System: BossActive = 0
→ System: Set BossActive to 1
→ Boss01: Set enabled True
→ BossCore: Set enabled True

On collision Player2 with BossGate
System: BossActive = 0
→ System: Set BossActive to 1
→ Boss01: Set enabled True
→ BossCore: Set enabled True
